name: Marvin CRUMP, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Crump v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Marvin CRUMP, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of September, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
101 A.3d 98
Marvin CRUMP, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 113 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 29, 2014.
